data.comment: The match has started at Independencia.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 3, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Ceara have a goal kick.
William Oliveira (Ceara) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 5, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Ceara's William Oliveira breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Ceara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
In the minute 8, Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) gets a yellow card.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 10, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Ceara's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 11, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
Hyoran of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Ceara at Independencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Hyoran. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Ceara to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 24, Ceara's Rafael Sobis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, At Independencia, Luiz Otavio has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Hyoran (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Allan for Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hyoran is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 31, Hyoran is back on the pitch.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 34, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Ceara throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Throw-in for Ceara at Independencia.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Ceara in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 38, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Ceara in their own half.
Free kick Ceara.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In the minute 39, Luiz Otavio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Luiz Otavio returns to the field for Ceara after picking up a slight injury.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Savio Pereira Sampaio blows against Atletico Mineiro's Keno for offside.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 44, At Independencia the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Hyoran gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, Ceara are coming forward and Fernando Sobral gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Rafael Sobis for Ceara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
The first half has been concluded at Independencia.
The second-half is now underway.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Ceara's half.
In the minute 46, Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a first substitution, with Guilherme Arana replacing Jair.
Ceara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 49, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
In the minute 50, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Can Ceara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 52, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Keno.
Ceara have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro’s Keno is on his feet again at Independencia.
In the minute 54, Ceara's Fernando Sobral misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 54, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to William Oliveira for Ceara who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Charles (Ceara) has replaced the possibly injured William Oliveira at Independencia.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Guga (Atletico Mineiro) has received a first yellow card.
Ceara push forward at Independencia and Manucho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atletico Mineiro defence.
In the minute 57, Ceara to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
The home team have replaced Jefferson Savarino with Marquinhos. This is the second substitution made today by Jorge Sampaoli.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 58, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Ceara's half.
Ceara pushes forward through Vinicius Lima, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 60, Vinicius Lima has recovered and rejoins the match in Belo Horizonte.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Vinicius Lima is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 61, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ceara's half?
In Belo Horizonte, Allan of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 63, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Ceara a goal kick.
Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Guga of Atletico Mineiro gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Ceara goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Ceara territory.
The away team has substituted Vinicius Lima with Victor Jacare. Guto Ferreira is thus making his second change.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 66, Cleber Bomfim is on a sub for Rafael Sobis for Ceara.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Ceara.
In Belo Horizonte Ceara attack through Cleber Bomfim. The finish is off target, however.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Ceara's Victor Jacare breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Atletico Mineiro.
Goal! Marrony gives Atletico Mineiro the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
In the minute 77, Vinicius Lima (Ceara) has received a yellow card from Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 77, Fabinho for Ceara has been booked by Savio Pereira Sampaio and receives a first yellow card.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro just outside Ceara's area.
Atletico Mineiro's Hyoran is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Ceara in their own half.
In the minute 81, Free kick Ceara.
Rick Lima is replacing Manucho for Ceara at Independencia.
Guto Ferreira is making the team's fifth substitution at Independencia with Wescley replacing Fernando Sobral.
Throw-in Ceara.
Marrony of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 83, Attention is being given to Ceara’s Fernando Prass and play has been suspended briefly.
Fernando Prass for Ceara is back on the field again.
In the minute 84, Ball safe as Ceara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jorge Sampaoli (Atletico Mineiro) is making a third substitution, with Leo Sena replacing Keno.
Atletico Mineiro have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 86, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the home team a throw-in.
Important block from the Atletico Mineiro defence as Cleber Bomfim fires in a strike for Ceara.
Free kick for Ceara in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Rick Lima (Ceara) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
The home team replace Hyoran with Fabio Santos.
It's now 2-0 in Belo Horizonte as Marrony scores for Atletico Mineiro.
Marquinhos with an assist there.
